title: Composer Buddies!
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>*Sigh*.... I wish I could write a wider variety of songs.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>What’s with you, all of a sudden?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>You don’t need to worry about me being one of the most listened-to college composers in the states despite being 14 years old, you know.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You’re right. There’s no need to worry about some childish spiel that comes out of this kid despite being so amazing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I’m not a kid!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>C-, calm down, Mia-chan! You too, Maki-chan! Let’s all get along, alright?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Look, Riko is worried now because of you, Maki.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>It’s definitely your fault, Mia.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>....Well, I guess composing is not my biggest worry anymore. Alright, the three of us will go to a cafe after this to get to know each other better, okay? We’re going to get along!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....Can you not lump me in as a kid too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Yeah, that’s right! Don’t treat me like a kid!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
